import React, { useState } from 'react' import './sidebar.css'; function Sidebar() { const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('overview'); return (
  • setActiveSection('overview')} className="active" id="dashboardBtn">Dashboard
  • setActiveSection('storage')} id="storageBtn">Storage
  • setActiveSection('reports')} id="reportsBtn">Reports
  • setActiveSection('settings')} id="settingsBtn">Settings
  • setActiveSection('help')} id="helpBtn">Help
  • setActiveSection('faq')} id="faqBtn">FAQ
  • setActiveSection('about')} id="aboutBtn">About Us
); } export default Sidebar;
